scripts.test:emulator: sh -c 'if [ -x ./node_modules/.bin/firebase ]; then ./node_modules/.bin/firebase emulators:exec --project demo-psika --only functions,firestore "RUN_EMULATOR_TESTS=1 NODE_ENV=test node --test integration.emulator.test.js"; else npx --yes firebase-tools emulators:exec --project demo-psika --only functions,firestore "RUN_EMULATOR_TESTS=1 NODE_ENV=test node --test integration.emulator.test.js"; fi'
scripts.test:emulator:npx: npx firebase-tools emulators:exec --project demo-psika --only functions,firestore "RUN_EMULATOR_TESTS=1 NODE_ENV=test node --test integration.emulator.test.js"
